description: Analyze and fix TypeScript import/export errors in frontend

workstreams.description: Run tsc and analyze import/export errors
Validate all fixes and run tsc again

decisions.decision: Remove explicit 'types' array from tsconfig.json to allow TypeScript auto-discovery
decisions.rationale: The types array was preventing TypeScript from finding @types packages. Removing it allows auto-discovery while type reference directives in .d.ts files handle specific imports.

decisions.decision: Clean TypeScript and Next.js cache to resolve stale module resolution issues
decisions.rationale: Incremental compilation cache was causing module resolution problems.

decisions.decision: Verify that tsconfig.json exclude patterns properly exclude test and config files
decisions.rationale: Updated tsconfig.json (by another agent/linter) now properly excludes test files, cypress, playwright, and other non-source files, reducing compilation scope and errors.

summary: Successfully fixed all 3 import/export related errors (TS2688). TypeScript now properly resolves all module imports and type definitions. Remaining errors are legitimate type mismatches in source code, not import/export issues.
